Name: Momo is Here
About the game: You were left alone at home for a few days. The phone was constantly ringing with strange calls in which voices spoke of Momo. These conversations were terrible. You have not slept for several days and are very tired. Deciding to take a nap, you are somehow transported to a place that resembles an abandoned house. The doors are locked, no one answers and certainly no one will help. Your task is to get out and not let yourself be caught! Solve puzzles, escape Momo's pursuit and get out of this nightmare! Don't get caught by Momo or you'll be finished! In the game you have to solve difficult puzzles! Find items to crack chests! Try to survive at all costs and escape from this horror! Game Features: *Great graphics! *Challenging puzzles! *Awesome plot! *Easter eggs!
